Installation systems for SOLAR PANELS: frames, fixings and accessories

Solar installations need to be fully resistant to outdoor elements. That is why INDEX® offers high-quality products for steel and aluminium solar panel structures, as well as all-in-one installation solutions to simplify component handling and assembly at the installation site.

A reliable system that is easy to assemble and maintain

  • Looking to the future

    The development of this new solution has been a challenging research and innovation project that led to the incorporation of cutting-edge technologies in materials/coatings and the need to design new profiles and assembly systems to deliver innovations to today's market.

  • Technical support

    The company provides comprehensive advice regarding the different systems, their suitability for the installation location, custom calculations and component breakdowns.

  • Certified and environmentally friendly production in Spain

    A large proportion of the products included in the new range is produced in Spain, which is necessary to guarantee the high levels of quality and innovation required.

  • Products adapted to small users

    We like to get to know the needs of all our customers to offer the best service.

  • Training

    We provide tailored training to show how to correctly use all the options and functions of our products.

Structures for solar panels

CO-PLANAR STRUCTURES FOR SOLAR PANELS

Frames for solar panels designed for sloping roofs. Enable panels to be easily and securely installed on a range of surfaces, whether vertically or horizontally.

Systems

  • SC-PSA
  • SC-PSD
  • SC-PSV
  • SC-PSE
  • SC-PSC
  • SC-GPX
  • SC-GPD
  • SC-GPV

TRIANGULAR STRUCTURES FOR SOLAR PANELS

Frames for solar panels designed for flat and low-gradient roofs. Enable panels to be easily and securely installed on a range of surfaces, whether vertically or horizontally.

Systems

  • ST-PSE
  • ST-GPX

SC-PSA

Coplanar system with winged aluminium profile (PSA-A). Direct fixing

Qualities and Advantages
  • System for sloping roofs with assembly parallel to the roof surface.
  • Installation on metal roofs in a raised position to accommodate ribs.
  • Portrait panel orientation (vertical).
  • Highly effective, rapid installation directly onto the roof.
  • Profile available in uncut format to simplify installation planning.
  • Joint between profiles using an inner profile and self-drilling screws, without obstructing the fixing of the panels.
  • Panel fixing with highly reliable and easy-to-install innovative solutions that are interchangeable between all assembly systems.

System Components

DIN-7504-K A2

Self-drilling hex head screw. A2 stainless.

More information

PSA-UN

Aluminium connector for profile PSA-A

More information

GM-A

Aluminium frame clamp.

More information

KFR-SC

Fast-fixing clamp assembly.

More information

PSA-A

Winged aluminium profile.

More information

SC-PSD

Coplanar system with winged aluminium profile (PSA-A). Direct fixing using pre-cut profile sections

Qualities and Advantages
  • System for sloping roofs with assembly parallel to the roof surface.
  • Installation on metal roofs in a raised position to accommodate ribs ≤ 360mm.
  • Installation on metal roofs in a raised position to accommodate ribs ≤ 360mm.
  • Highly effective, rapid installation directly onto the roof.
  • Profile installed in pre-cut sections to reduce the number of metres of profile used.
  • Panel fixing with highly reliable and easy-to-install innovative solutions that are interchangeable between all assembly systems.

SC-PSV

Coplanar system with winged aluminium profile (PSA- AV). Direct fixing in recess using pre-cut profile sections

Qualities and Advantages
  • System for sloping roofs with assembly parallel to the roof surface.
  • Installation on metal roofs on the lower area of the roof.
  • Landscape panel orientation (Horizontal).
  • Highly effective, rapid installation directly onto the roof.
  • Profile installed in pre-cut sections to reduce the number of metres of profile used.
  • Panel fixing with highly reliable and easy-to-install innovative solutions that are interchangeable between all assembly systems.

SC-PSE

Coplanar system with PSE-A aluminium profile. Pre-assembled fixing

Qualities and Advantages
  • System for sloping roofs with assembly parallel to the roof surface.
  • Installation on all roof types, assembled on adjustable fixing accessories.
  • Portrait (vertical) and landscape (horizontal) panel orientation.
  • Fixing of pre-assembled system on adjustable fixing accessories, anchored to the roof or substructure, with a wide range of adjustable fixing accessories available.
  • Profile available in uncut format to simplify installation planning.
  • Joint between profiles using an inner profile and self-drilling screws, without obstructing the fixing of the panels.
  • Panel fixing with highly reliable and easy-to-install innovative solutions that are interchangeable between all assembly systems

SC-PSC

Coplanar system with PSE-C aluminium profile. Lateral pre-assembled fixing

Qualities and Advantages
  • System for sloping roofs with assembly parallel to the roof surface.
  • Installation on all roof types, assembled on adjustable fixing accessories and directly on sheet metal.
  • Portrait (vertical) and landscape (horizontal) panel orientation.
  • Fixing of pre-assembled system on adjustable fixing accessories, anchored to the roof or substructure, with a wide range of adjustable fixing accessories available.
  • Profile available in uncut format to simplify installation planning.
  • Profile installed in pre-cut sections to reduce the number of metres of profile used.
  • Joint between profiles using an inner profile and self-drilling screws, without obstructing the fixing of the panels.
  • Panel fixing with highly reliable and easy-to-install innovative solutions that are interchangeable between all assembly systems.

Coplanar system with Indextrut Solar GP-XS perforated steel guide with Atlantis C4-M coating.

  • Joint between profiles using an inner profile and self-drilling screws, without obstructing the fixing of the panels.
  • Panel fixing with highly reliable and easy-to-install innovative solutions that are interchangeable between all assembly systems.

SC-GPD

Coplanar system with Indextrut Solar GP-XS perforated guide with Atlantis C4-M coating. Pre-cut guide format

Qualities and Advantages
  • System for sloping roofs with assembly parallel to the roof surface.
  • Installation on metal roofs raised above the ribs.
  • Landscape panel orientation (horizontal).
  • Highly effective, rapid installation directly onto the roof.
  • Profile available in pre-cut sections to reduce the number of metres of profile used as much as possible.
  • Panel fixing with highly reliable and easy-to-install innovative solutions that are interchangeable between all assembly systems.

  • Installation on metal roofs on the lower area of the roof.
  • Landscape panel orientation (horizontal).
  • Highly effective, rapid installation directly onto the roof.
  • Profile installed in pre-cut sections to reduce the number of metres of profile used.
  • Panel fixing with highly reliable and easy-to-install innovative solutions that are interchangeable between all assembly systems.

ST-PSE

Triangular system with PSE-A aluminium profile. Pre-assembled fixing

Qualities and Advantages
  • System for flat and low-gradient roofs, mounted at an angle with respect to the roof.
  • Installation on all roof types, on pre-assembled triangles with an angle adjustable to 25°, 30° or 35°.
  • Portrait panel orientation (vertical).
  • Option of fixing the system directly to the substructure by anchoring the feet of the triangle supports.
  • Option of mounting the assembled system on an auxiliary profile frame anchored to the substructure, using fast-fixing nuts to the feet of the triangle supports.
  • Profile available in uncut format to simplify installation planning.
  • Lengthways joint between profiles using an inner profile and self-drilling screws, without obstructing the fixing of the panels.
  • Installation of profiles and triangles using pre-assembled fast-fixing solutions.
  • Panel fixing with highly reliable and easy-to-install innovative solutions that are interchangeable between all assembly systems.

System Components

DIN-7504-K A2

Self-drilling hex head screw. A2 stainless.

More information

GM-A

Aluminium frame clamp.

More information

KFR-SC

Fast-fixing clamp assembly.

More information

TPA-R

Pre-assembled adjustable aluminium triangle.

More information

KFS-FL

Bracket for lateral fixing. A2 stainless.

PSE-UN

Aluminium joint for PSE-A profile.

PSE-A

Aluminium profile for pre-assembled fixing.

More information

ST-GPX

Triangular system with Indextrut Solar GP-XS perforated guide with Atlantis C4-M coating

Qualities and Advantages
  • System for flat and low-gradient roofs, mounted at an angle with respect to the roof.
  • Installation on all roof types, on pre-assembled triangles with an angle adjustable to 25° or 35°.
  • Portrait (vertical) and landscape (horizontal) panel orientation.
  • Option of fixing the system directly to the substructure by anchoring the feet of the triangle supports.
  • Option of mounting the assembled system on an auxiliary perforated guide frame anchored to the substructure, using fast-fixing nuts to the feet of the triangle supports.
  • Guide available in uncut format to simplify installation planning.
  • Lengthways joint between guides using an inner coupling and fast-fixing DIN603 bolts, without obstructing the fixing of the panels.
  • Installation of profiles and triangles using fast-fixing bolts.
  • Panel fixing with highly reliable and easy-to-install innovative solutions that are interchangeable between all assembly systems.

Solar Panel Kits. More cost-effective, less waste

These kits are suitable for co-planar or triangular installations and contain all the necessary components for the complete installation

We have kits for 2 or 3 panels (starter kits) for various types of solar panel supports (co-planar and triangular). kits para 2 or 3 panels (starter kits), that allow the installation of additional panels without incurring unnecessary costs.

These kits contain everything you need to expand your installation but allow you to remove unnecessary products (duplicate clamp assemblies), therefore saving on costs and avoiding waste.

How many solar panels do you want to add? Select the number of panels

Other anchor fittings for solar panel installations

Metal fixings

Metal expansion fixings or wedged fixings in carbon steel and stainless steel, approved for the installation of elements in cracked concrete, non-cracked concrete, seismic loads and R30-R120 fire resistance in concrete.

More information

Plastic fixings

Made from high-quality Nylon®, plastic fixings are the perfect, cost-effective solution for fixing light and medium weight loads.

More information

Chemical anchors

Chemical injection fixings are the optimal solution for fixing heavy loads on concrete and masonry or where an approved product is required.

More information

Bolts and screws

A wide variety of self-tapping screws and self-threading screws are available, as well as different types of heads, diameters and lengths.

More information

Plastic clamps

Nylon® cable ties and their plastic clamps are some of the most highly demanded products in the world of professional installations.

More information

TÉCNICAS EXPANSIVAS S.L. informs you that the personal data provided voluntarily on this website, the purpose, intended transfers and other circumstances of which are communicated when the personal data is collected, may, depending on the specific case, have any of the following purposes: responding to your request, complaint or question, maintaining the established relationship, the comprehensive and commercial management of customers, accounting and invoicing or sending of communications of news and activities related with TÉCNICAS EXPANSIVAS S.L., including by electronic means.

The data included in our files is absolutely confidential and will be processed with the utmost confidentiality and in compliance with all the requirements set out in the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the 27<sup>th</sup> of April 2016. The data is registered in our files for the time necessary for the purpose for which it was collected. The period during which the personal data will be kept will be that established by current legislation and always during the period of the provision of the service for which it was provided.

We do not recommend sending personal data that is classified as highly confidential by data protection legislation, such as that related to health, as it is not sent coded or encrypted. Therefore, if you send this type of data, it will be at your own risk.

The user may at any time exercise their rights of access, rectification, opposition, erasure, restricted processing or requesting of its portability in accordance with the content of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the 27<sup>th</sup> of April 2016 by sending a letter to the data controller: Valentín Gómez, Manager, along with a photocopy of their National Identity Document (DNI), to TÉCNICAS EXPANSIVAS SL | P.I. La Portalada II | C/ Segador 13, 26006 | Logroño (La Rioja) or by email to info@indexfix.com
